website_summaries.verdict: Basic, inexpensive, handy – this model offers features you need and nothing you don't in a model that will fit almost anyone's budget.
pros: Straightforward design is small enough to place almost anywhere
cons: The volume likely won't be loud enough for some consumers, especially those who have hearing difficulties

customer_reviews.title: Excellent answering machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I chose this as the price was right for me at this time-I was very satisfied with the performance of the machine and it is very easy to to use and to figure out. I like the size too. It hardly takes any room.
customer_reviews.author: chastainwolf

customer_reviews.title: wrong product delivered
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is selling the -1B version of this machine, J&R ships the -1 which is the only model they stock and it has fewer features than the -1B. I purchased the -1B for "answer only", -1 does not have that feature ... so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: JeB @ Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the previous problem with setup was fixed with the seller's help. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLDOGS

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This product was described as having two outgoing messages, but it does not......it was misrepresented and does not have the option of two OGM.
customer_reviews.author: a real person

customer_reviews.title: Happy with ease of set up
customer_reviews.text: arrived in original package but housing is yellowed as described. Happy with ease of set up, message review, size and features. More economical than voice mail from my phone service provider.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Pam

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute junk !!! Both outgoing , and incoming messages are very garbled at best . Speaker is on the bottom of the machine , wonder who's idea that was ? Avoid this machine ! Don't let it's low price lure you in as it did me . Bell should be ashamed to put there name on this product !
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't record an outgoing message that could be understood. Just doesn't work. Prerecorded message barely ok.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This answering machine was not as good as the older model
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lipsett

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ANSWERING MACHINE !
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-frills old-school machine , easy to hookup and to use. It was just what I was looking for , and at $5.49 it's a great bargain also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: NW Bell  Digial Ans. Machine 62800-1B
customer_reviews.text: It works well all around. Every thing I wanted it to be. Better than I expected. A very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, but gets the job done for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this answering system because I wanted something simple that would just take messages when I wasn't available too. It took me about 5 mins to read through the instructions and get it all set up. (I'm not that electronic savvy to save my life) And I was connecting it to a phone AND a fax machine so wasn't sure how that would work. In no time....worked like a charm. Messages could be a little clearer but it really isn't that bad...It definitely does what it's supposed to and set up is a cinch!
customer_reviews.author: At Home Professional

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly decent machine. The only complaint is the buttons are too close together. I would recommend a different brand if you have large fingers. The sound is quite clear. This is the 62800 model NOT the 1B. It`s easy to set up. The other reviews should have mentioned the buttons. I got it on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well functioning answering machine for basic needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a well functioning, easy to use answering machine for your basic answering needs. I would recommend this product to anyone who just wants an answering machine, and not all the confusing 'bells & whistles'.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Davis
